author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
message: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
title: Thought of the day

author: Edwin Markham
message: We have committed the Golden Rule to memory; let us now commit it to life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert Southey
message: It is with words as with sunbeams. The more they are condensed, the deeper they burn.
title: Thought of the day

author: Tony Robbins
message: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.
title: Thought of the day
